txt.en: Watch the funeral proceedings.
TBD
Fríthild lies upon the table before the fireplace.\n\nThane Ordlac asked you to retrieve Fríthild's shield and place it upon her in state.
Young Reeve Fríthbert and his sister Edhild appear distraught at Thane Ordlac's pronouncement. You should speak with them.
Watch the funeral proceedings
Watch the funeral proceedings.
Thane Ordlac stands before the table where Reeve Fríthild lies.\n\nThane Ordlac wishes for you to speak with him again.
Talk to Thane Ordlac
'I beg your pardon, Thane, and mean no offence to you, but these words are hollow and are of no comfort....'
TBD
Talk to Fríthbert
Fríthild lies upon the table before the fireplace.\n\nThane Ordlac asked you to retrieve Fríthild's sword and place it upon her in state.
TBD
Witness Ordlac's pronouncement
'I believe you were dismissed....'
Talk to Edhild
Talk to Dudsig
You have come to Reeve Fríthild's house to honour her before her children.
TBD
Thane Ordlac stands before the table where Reeve Fríthild lies.\n\nThane Ordlac wishes for you to speak with him again.
TBD
'My friends, we are here to pay tribute to a great woman....'
'[placeholder], will you bring Fríthild's sword and place it, as well, upon her in honour?'
TBD
'Fríthild has passed from our fellowship, but let us not view her passing with mourning....'
Talk to Thane Ordlac
'Rather, let us celebrate her valour and courage.'
Collect Reeve Fríthild's sword
'[placeholder], will you bring Fríthild's shield and lay it upon her?'
'Fríthild was trained as a shield-maiden of Rohan....'
'And though it has been hundreds of years since our womenfolk went to war, she was no less skilled in the art.'
'She was in truth a shield of great strength against the evils of our time. Let us honour her for this.'
'[placeholder]....'
'Fríthild was a great swordswoman, and the foe learned this through many forays.'
Dudsig is near the door to Reeve Fríthild's house.\n\nDudsig wishes to speak with you.
Thane Ordlac stands before the table where Reeve Fríthild lies.\n\nYou should speak with Thane Ordlac before the funeral begins.
Observe the funeral proceedings
'I am frightened, [placeholder]. Thane Ordlac smiles very much, but I do not like his eyes. There is no kindness in his eyes. He looks at us strangely, and it frightens me.'
'Though her allies fell around her, she stood strong in the face of great evil....'
'Indeed, not only was she the shield of the Broadacres, but she was its sword of swift vengeance.'
TBD
'Let us honour her for this!'
Collected Reeve Fríthild's sword
Fríthild's sword is on the table near the door.\n\nThane Ordlac asked you to retrieve Fríthild's sword and place it upon her in state.
'I take no offence, I assure you...it is understandable that you grieve.'
Collect Reeve Fríthild's shield

'Thane Ordlac has instructed me to keep the children in seclusion. I am sure you understand that with their mother dead and Fríthbert not yet old enough to assume his title, they are in danger...you never found the traitor in Oserley, you know.

'As much as I dislike you, you have proven a trusted friend to the Broadacres; however, even you will not be allowed to speak with the children again without Thane Ordlac's leave.

'Good day to you.'
'Before we adjourn, I must make known Fríthild's last wishes....'
'As Fríthbert has not yet come of age and Thane Tordag perished in Torsbury....'
TBD
Place Fríthild's shield upon her in state
'I am regent of the Broadacres and protector of Fríthild's children....'
'I am glad that you are able to join us, my friend. I am sure that Fríthild would have wished it. Let us begin....'
'Of this, [placeholder] was a witness to, as were all present here.'
Place Reeve Fríthild's sword upon her in state
Talk to Thane Ordlac
Collected Reeve Fríthild's shield
Placed Fríthild's shield upon her in state
TBD
Placed Reeve Fríthild's sword upon her in state
'My thanks to you for bringing honour to Fríthild. It means much to her children. However, before we adjourn, I must make one pronouncement, and you should be a witness to it....'
TBD

'Good [placeholder], did our mother truly proclaim Thane Ordlac as our regent? This is most horrible.\n\n'I cannot say why, but Ordlac makes me uneasy. He always seems friendly and cheerful, but he makes light even of sad things....'
TBD
Watch the funeral proceedings
Instance: Shield-maiden of Rohan
Fríthild's shield is on the table near the door.\n\nThane Ordlac asked you to retrieve Fríthild's shield and place it upon her in state.
